nocodb 0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

Common

Common functions that are of generic use.

api()
Call NocoDB API

Meta

Functions to work with NocoDB’s RESTful meta APIs.

Bases

Functions to manage NocoDB bases (aka “projects”).

bases()
Get NocoDB bases metadata
base_id()
Get NocoDB base ID
base()
Get NocoDB bases metadata
create_base()
Create NocoDB base
update_base()
Update NocoDB base metadata

Tables

Functions to manage NocoDB tables.

tbls()
Get NocoDB tables metadata
tbl_id()
Get NocoDB table ID
tbl()
Get NocoDB table metadata
update_tbl()
Update NocoDB table metadata
reorder_tbl()
Re-order NocoDB table
set_tbl_metadata()
Set metadata for NocoDB tables

Table columns

Functions to manage NocoDB table columns (aka “fields”).

tbl_cols()
Get NocoDB table columns metadata
tbl_col_id()
Get NocoDB column ID
tbl_col()
Get NocoDB table column metadata
update_tbl_col()
Update NocoDB table column metadata
set_display_val()
Set column as NocoDB display value
set_display_vals()
Set all NocoDB display value columns

Users

Functions to manage NocoDB users.

users()
Get NocoDB users metadata
create_user()
Create NocoDB user

Attachments

Functions to manage NocoDB attachments.

upload_attachments()
Upload NocoDB attachments
